actions.step: A day ahead baste the pork belly skin with vinegar and salt every few hours and expose to air in the refrigerator.
Make shallow incisions on the meat side and rub in the five spice powder and sugar.
Cover the sides of the pork belly with aluminum foil and cook in an oven at 300 on the bottom rack until cooked through.
Baste the skin with vinegar and salt one more time.
Poke holes in the skin with a sharp fork or skewer.
Return the pork belly to the oven on the top rack and broil until the skin bubbles and crisps to a golden brown.
Let stand for a few minutes. Cut into slices or cubes. Serve.
